ModMetaData.name: Time as a Slave
ModMetaData.author: llunak
ModMetaData.description:
This simple mod provides a 'Time as a slave' record for each pawn.
The game provides per-pawn records such as 'Time as a colonist', 'Time hauling', etc., but when Ideology introduced slavery, it omitted adding 'Time as a slave' record. This mod adds that.
This mod is also a weak dependency for the 'More Precepts' mod - if a 'Newcomer Attitude' precept is used, it uses this mod to count correctly stay at the colony for slaves.
GitHub: https://github.com/llunak/rimworld-timeasslave
